article_text:
NEW JERSEY Lowenstein Sandler Signs 15-Year Lease

The owners of a former pharmaceutical office building in Roseland, N.J., have signed a national law firm as its marquee tenant.

Lowenstein Sandler LLP has signed a 15-year lease to occupy about 170,000 square feet at 56 Livingston Ave., which was bought by partners Mountain Development Corp. and Square Mile Capital Management LLC in 2012. The 434,000-square-foot building, on 56 acres,...
